original_text: And in the reign of Ahasuerus, in the beginning of his reign, wrote they unto him an accusation against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem.
korean_text: 또 아하수에로가 즉위할 때에 그들이 글을 올려 유다와 예루살렘 주민을 고발하니라

sentences.original_text: And in the reign of Ahasuerus
in the beginning of his reign
wrote they unto him an accusation
against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem
